name: Teamliquid - minimalistic dark theme
description:
Dark and minimalistic theme for TeamLiquid.net. Bring lovely [quote] to your browser!

Feel free to customize the stylesheet to your likings, everything is nice and dandy (with comments on top!). Just dig in and comment/uncomment styles as you like.

Feedback: http://www.teamliquid.net/blogs/viewblog.php?id=284648
Coding: user 123403 with work from user 39872 and user 110168, Artwork: user 110168
additional_info:
Rewrite of style 24624 by user 39872 to fix many issues and make the stylesheet clean and commented.

Gallery: http://imgur.com/a/1TBHi#0

FIXME:
as of nov 1st, the sidebars stopped using tables, a lot of stuff can now be removed from here

TODO:
- Find a way of keeping background images in news and still be readable

Main changes from style 24624:
- Complete rewrite
- Keep all the ads visible (top center and TLAF on the bottom right)
- Replace TL banner and BBcode icons with darker ones (from http://www.teamliquid.net/forum/viewmessage.php?topic_id=239280)
- Add comments everywhere in the css to allow for easy customization

Changes from style 55851:
- Fixed Broodwar icons

Changelog:
- 1.0b4 (01/11/13): following the new official design (using divs instead of tables), fixed the left sidebar. much more to come still
- 1.0b3 (12/10/13): event videos styling (homepage)
- 1.0b2 (07/10/13): fix for upcoming featured event (IEM)
- 1.0b1 (07/10/13): fixes to follow the new design, wider design overall, banner hidden, spoilers styled
- 1.0a1 (24/02/12): revamped sidebars, better news sections, styled the calendar
- 0.9.2 (09/02/12): made forum annoucements more visible
- 0.9.1 (04/02/12): added support for all of TL pages
- 0.2.6 (17/11/11): fixed TL banner (broken by the new horse logo)
- 0.2.5 (15/11/11): fixed Nazgul's icon in post headers, stop hidding TL social media icons
- 0.2.4 (14/11/11): fixed polls both in the forums and at teamliquid.net/poll/
- 0.2.3 (13/11/11): fixed FlashBlocked videos (they were not displaying the FlashBlock icon)
- 0.2.2 (12/11/11): small fixes
- 0.2.1 (12/11/11): small fixes
- 0.2.0 (11/11/11): new color for section titles in the left sidebar
- 0.1.0 (10/11/11): initial release
